name: Ace Attorney 6
description:
Ace Attorney 6 is an adventure game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Capcom.
You can play Ace Attorney 6 on Nintendo 3DS.
Motohide Eshiro produced the game. It was directed by Takeshi Yamazaki and Takuro Fuse. Masami Onodera, Noriyuki Iwadare and Toshihiko Horiyama scored the game.
